ygData.subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Where to be lvl 31
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummmm, What faction hit? I never got a faction hit for a hill giant or a Cyclops before.  Although its been a while since I have hunted there. Mu ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Ummmm, What faction hit? I never got a faction hit for a hill giant or a
Cyclops before. Although its been a while since I have hunted there.

Mu


-----Original Message-----
From: Sinarya L'achesis [mailto:selene1212@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 2:26 PM
To: warriors_eq@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Where to be lvl 31


A couple other great spots for that level are the
rangers (if you can take the faction hit) in EC
or WC or a cyclops/hill giant group in the Rathe
Mountains (both of which con red to me at this
level). I'm just starting to group at these 2
spots, but I've seen other players up to level 40
fighting these mobs and both are good for loot
and xp!! They drop plat & fine steel weapons and
at both areas there are vendors to sell to. =)

Kinrea Keres
26th DE Warrior



=====
Sinarya L'achesis
